string-array.name: table_create_scripts
string-array.item: CREATE TABLE tbl_users (_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT ,userId TEXT, password TEXT, firstName TEXT, lastName TEXT, address TEXT, city TEXT, postalCode TEXT);
CREATE TABLE tbl_schedule (_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT ,_userId TEXT, date TEXT, site TEXT, startTime TEXT, endTime TEXT, checkInTime TEXT, checkOutTime TEXT);
